name: Keyboard Cowboy (MacDonik)
description:
Available now at your nearest picture house is this latest western moving picture: Keyboard Cowboy.  You'll feel like you're in charge of defending from a train robbery using only your telegraph machine (keyboard for all them future folk) and reflexes!

Tap the letters shown to shoot enemies.  There is a firing rate to prevent spamming so be wary of that if a key feels slow to respond at times.

Optional hardcore challenge is to complete the final level without losing a single carriage.

Controls :

Space - Skip (Intro Only)

Escape - Pause Menu

M - Mute/UnMute

Music is "Wagon Wheel" by Kevin McCleod.  Available at:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bKAniWW0I0

Note: For any non-cinephiles out there, this game's style is inspired by The Great Train Robbery, considered the first Western film and one of the first blockbusters in film history.
